46 #ifndef CODEBASE_HAL_HAL_SAADC_H_
47 #define CODEBASE_HAL_HAL_SAADC_H_

49 #include "nrf_saadc.h"
50 #include "nrf_assert.h"
51 
52 #ifdef NRF51
53 #error SAADC peripheral is not present in the nRF51 SoC
54 #endif
55 
60 #define saadc_channel_init nrf_saadc_channel_init
61 
68 __STATIC_INLINE void saadc_continuous_sampling_rate_set(uint32_t sampling_rate_div)
69 {
70  ASSERT((sampling_rate_div>=80) && (sampling_rate_div <= 2047));
71 
72  NRF_SAADC->SAMPLERATE = (sampling_rate_div << SAADC_SAMPLERATE_CC_Pos) |
73  (SAADC_SAMPLERATE_MODE_Timers << SAADC_SAMPLERATE_MODE_Pos);
74 }
75 
79 __STATIC_INLINE void saadc_sampling_task_mode_set(void)
80 {
81  NRF_SAADC->SAMPLERATE = (0 << SAADC_SAMPLERATE_CC_Pos) |
82  (SAADC_SAMPLERATE_MODE_Task << SAADC_SAMPLERATE_MODE_Pos);
83 }
84 
85 #endif /* CODEBASE_HAL_HAL_SAADC_H_ */
